author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Bpifrance Announces Sale Of Its Cegedim's Shares, For 9 To 12 Percent Of Capital
text:
Feb 12 (Reuters) - Bpifrance:
* SALE OF CEGEDIM SA SHARES HELD BY BPIFRANCE FOR 9% TO 12% OF CAPITAL
* SHARES HELD BY BPIFRANCE FOR 9% TO 12% OF CAPITAL * FREE-FLOAT TO INCREASE TO REACH MAX OF 44.1% OF CAPITAL - BPI FRANCE
* FOLLOWING SETTLEMENT, BPIFRANCE PARTICIPATIONS WILL SELL A MAXIMUM OF 12% OF CEGEDIMâ€™S CAPITAL
* THEREFORE, BPIFRANCE PARTICIPATIONS WILL POTENTIALLY BREACH DOWNWARDS 5% THRESHOLD Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
